[38;2;255;255;255m ┌────────────────────────────────┬───────────────────────────────┐[39m
[38;2;255;255;255m │ Software:                      │                               │[39m [38;2;091;206;250m⣿⣿⣿⢸⣿⣿⡏⢰⣿⣿⣿⡟⢠⣜⡛⣛⣡⣿⣿⣿⡏⢠⣄⠀⠻⠀⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿ [39m
[38;2;255;255;255m │ 󰣇 OS: $SYS                     │           $HOST               │[39m [38;2;091;206;250m⣿⣿⡇⣼⣿⡟⠀⣾⣿⡿⠋⣰⣿⣿⠀⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⢇⠸⢿⡿⠆⡀⢻⣿⣿⣿⣿ [39m
[38;2;255;255;255m │  Kernel: $KER                 │                               │[39m [38;2;245;169;184m⣿⣿⡇⢿⠟⠰⠇⠛⠋⣤⣚⣛⣛⣿⠀⣿⣿⣿⣿⢏⣼⣿⣶⣶⣿⣇⠸⣿⣿⣿⣿ [39m
[38;2;255;255;255m │  Packages: $PAC               │      a really good girl       │[39m [38;2;245;169;184m⣿⣿⡇⣈⣴⠆⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⣬⣿⡆⢻⣿⣿⢏⣼⣿⢿⣟⡿⣿⣿⡄⢿⣿⡿⣿ [39m
[38;2;255;255;255m │  Uptime: $UP                  │                               │[39m [38;2;255;255;255m⣿⣿⡇⣿⣿⡄⣤⣄⠛⣀⣘⢿⣿⣿⡏⢚⣩⣵⣾⣿⣿⡆⠈⠉⠛⠻⠷⠈⣿⡇⣿ [39m
[38;2;255;255;255m │                                └───────────────────────────────┤[39m [38;2;255;255;255m⠘⣿⣧⢹⣿⣷⣬⣛⣛⣛⣭⣾⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⢀⣀⢠⡄⢀⣀⣄⠹⢀⣿ [39m
[38;2;255;255;255m │ Hardware:                                                      │[39m [38;2;255;255;255m⡇⣌⠻⡎⣷⣹⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣎⡻⢦⣴⡾⣻⣿⡆⣸⣿ [39m
[38;2;255;255;255m │  Disk: $DISK                                                  │[39m [38;2;245;169;184m⡇⣿⣷⣮⣽⣿⣿⡟⣋⣤⡘⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣩⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣷⣶⣾⣿⡿⢀⠏⣿ [39m
[38;2;255;255;255m │  RAM: $MEM                                                    │[39m [38;2;245;169;184m⡇⠹⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⢰⣿⣿⣷⣌⡻⢿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣇⢸⡹⢁⢠⣾⣿ [39m
[38;2;255;255;255m │ 󰘚 CPU: $CPU                                     $TEM $PT       │[39m [38;2;091;206;250m⡀⡀⠈⠻⣿⣿⣿⡎⢿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣶⣭⣍⣛⡛⢻⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣾⣿⡿⣸⣿⣿ [39m
[38;2;255;255;255m │  Arch: $ARCH                                                  │[39m [38;2;091;206;250m⠀⣷⣿⣷⣦⣙⠻⢿⣮⣛⠿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⢏⣾⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⠿⣋⢱⣿⡏⣿ [39m
[38;2;255;255;255m └────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘[39m


# Legend:

# $HOST = Username@Hostname
# $SYS  = Operating System
# $KER  = Kernel
# $MEM  = RAM (Memory)
# $UP   = Uptime
# $PAC  = Packages (only pacman currently supported)
# $ARCH = CPU Architecture
# $TEM  = CPU Temp,
# $PT   = CPU Usage (percent),
# $CPU  = CPU Name,
# $DISK = Disk ("used/total MB"),

# Warnings:

# Using escape characters can cause unpredictable behavior
# Using multiple keyword tags on one line can cause unpredictable behavior
